name: Defensive Fire (V)
Lore: '275 gunners manning 60 turbolaser batteries provide a wide firing arc. Even so, asteroids are a challenge due to the sluggish recharge rates of the high-powered blasters.',
Text: 'If opponent just initiated battle, you may immediately fire one non-lightsaber, non-Permanent weapon present in that battle once (for free), adding 2 to each of its destiny draws. That weapon may fire again this battle.',
